question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country. -explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months - say how your work could be done while you are away - ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing to inquire to accept my appeal for work at  the company's  head office in Florida from March to September.

In fact, some courses related to my job will be provided by American Accounting Association in Florida. I would like to enrol on these courses, which will be extremely useful for my career. In addition, working in another country provide me with this opportunity to gain valuable experience in business in the English language.

My assistant has been working with me since 6 months ago and she will undertake my tasks if my request could be accepted. Furthermore, some of my work will be done online from Florida in my free time. I have time to apply for these courses before February 6th.
I would be extremely grateful if you could assist me in arranging this transference to America.
I appreciate your prompt attention regarding  this matter.
